mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DESTINATION( DEST_NO, DEST_CATEGORY, DEST_SUBJECT, DEST_SUMMARY, DEST_CONTENT, DEST_ADDRESS, DEST_MAP_X, DEST_MAP_Y, DEST_LIKE_SUM, DEST_RATING_AVG, DEST_HIT, DEST_CREATEDATE, DEST_UPDATEDATE, LOCATION_ID, DEST_IMAGE) VALUES( DEST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{title}, #{summary}, 'nothing', #{addr1}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{areacode}, #{firstimage} )
mapper.select: SELECT LOCATION FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = #{i}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM DESTINATION WHERE DEST_CATEGORY = (SELECT DEST_CATEGORY FROM DESTINATION WHERE DEST_NO = #{destNo}) ORDER BY DEST_HIT) A
WHERE rownum >= 1 AND rownum <= 4
SELECT * FROM DESTINATION WHERE LOCATION_ID = #{locationId} ORDER BY DEST_LIKE_SUM

SELECT A.LOCATION_ID, B.LOCATION, B.LCENTERX, B.LCENTERY FROM (SELECT LOCATION_ID, SUM(${value}) SUM FROM DESTINATION GROUP BY LOCATION_ID) A, LOCATION B WHERE A.LOCATION_ID = B.LOCATION_ID ORDER BY A.SUM DESC
SELECT * FROM DESTINATION WHERE DEST_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY DEST_LIKE_SUM
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DESTINATION_LIKE WHERE DEST_NO = #{destNo} AND M_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DESTINATION_LIKE WHERE DEST_NO = #{destNo} AND M_NO = #{memberNo}
